name: HOSS RYE LAGER
description: HOSS is based on the Märzen lagers of Germany. Rich, layered malt notes, with hints of cherry and dark fruits, dominate, while the unique addition of rye imparts a slightly earthy, spicy character.

name: BARREL AGED YETI
description: The spirited aging process produces a hugely complex but mellowed Yeti, with its signature roasted flavors, hints of vanilla and oak, and a whiskeyed finish.  Who says you can’t tame a beast?

name: RUMBLE IPA
description: RUMBLE IPA is an American IPA with subtle nuance. Brewed with heavy handed additions of Pacific Northwest hops, this beer is gently aged on French and American oak resulting in a wonderful balance of bitterness, caramel sweetness, vanilla, and undertones of pine and citrus.

name: PEACH GRAND CRU
description: Brewed with Colorado fruit picked right at the peak of ripeness, this Belgian-style ale marries two of our home state’s well-known offerings: great beer and fresh Palisade peaches.

name: DARK & STORMY
description: Gosling's Black Seal Rum and ginger beer

name: CASINO COCKTAIL
description: Ransom Old Tom Gin, Leopold Bros. Maraschino,lemon and orange bitters

name: 2011 Jacques Girardin Burgundy
description: A bold, voluptuos red with soft tannins and a spicy finish

name: 2011 Sonoma Cutrer Chardonnay
description: These grapes grow in the verdant Russian River Valley, producing a nice balance of fruit and vanilla.
